questions.question: What is the past simple of 'pay'?
If you see a 'Withdrawal' of $50 on your statement, what happened?
options: The bank gave you $50 as a gift.
questions.explanation: A withdrawal is money taken out of an account.

questions.question: Complete: 'Yesterday, he ________ to the bank to talk to the manager.'
What is the 'Balance' in your bank statement?
options: The total amount of money you have at a specific time
The list of all banks in the city
The name of the bank manager
The interest rate of your loan
questions.explanation: Balance is the amount of money remaining in an account.

questions.question: Which of these is NOT an irregular verb in the past?
questions.explanation: 'Visit' is regular (visited), while the others are irregular (sent, bought, got).
